sentence.Network_en: Charges had already been made against certain officials suspected of disloyalty.

sentence.Network_en: Only death could have forced that disloyalty from Melanie.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有死亡才迫使媚兰说出了对他的批评.

sentence.Network_en: He hated happiness bought with disloyalty and cruelty and indifference.
sentence.Network_cn: 他憎恨用不忠、残忍和冷漠换来的幸福.
